name: CLAIM_INFO3
description: This table contains claims information from Claim Information (CLM) records for Hospital and Professional Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: KIDMED_IMMUNI_C_NAME
columns.description: The last immunization date for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_SUSPECTED_YN
columns.description: Whether there are suspected conditions, for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_REASON
columns.description: The appointment reason for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R1_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The appointment type for the first referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_REASON
columns.description: The appointment reason for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R2_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The appointment type for the second referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_FST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's last name for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_LAST
columns.description: The referred-to provider's first name for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_PROV_PH
columns.description: The referred-to provider's phone number for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_APPT_DT
columns.description: The appointment date for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_REASON
columns.description: The appointment reason for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The appointment type for the third referral for the KidMed visit.

columns.name: SPARCS_START_DATETIME
columns.description: The start date and time of the patient's presence in the operating room.

columns.name: SPARCS_END_DATETIME
columns.description: The end date and time of the patient's presence in the operating room.

columns.name: SPARCS_ANESTHESIA_C_NAME
columns.description: Type of anesthesia administered during the stay.

columns.name: SPARCS_EXEMPT_UI_C_NAME
columns.description: The code which identifies a discharge from a unit within the facility that is exempt from Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) reimbursement.
entries: All Services at Hospital are Exempt

columns.name: AMBL_PICK_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the ambulance pick-up location address country.

columns.name: AMBL_DROP_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the ambulance drop-off location address country.

columns.name: CLIENT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the patient is a new or existing client.

columns.name: INCOME_AMT
columns.description: The patient's annual income.

columns.name: NUM_PEOPLE_SUPPORTD
columns.description: This item is used to store the number of people financially supported by the patient.

columns.name: ML_PRIM_BRTH_CTRL_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the primary method of male birth control being used by the patient.

columns.name: PRACTITNR_LVL_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the medical practitioner level code of the practitioner that's seeing the patient.

columns.name: PAYMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store whether the patient made a full, partial, or no payment for the visit.

columns.name: FAM_PLANNG_ELIG_DT
columns.description: The date the patient became eligible for family planning insurance.

columns.name: INSURANCE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The family planning insurance type used by the patient.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the employer record for this Workers' Comp claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: CLINICAL_TRIAL_NUM
columns.description: The National Clinical Trial (NCT) number.

columns.name: RESUB_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Record the reason for the claim resubmission.

columns.name: CVR_LST_CT_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether there was a last chlamydia test, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_LST_CT_TEST_DT
columns.description: Date of the last chlamydia test, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_LST_PAP_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether there was a last pap test, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_LST_PAP_TEST_DT
columns.description: Date of the last pap test, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_INS_ENRL_ASST_C_NAME
columns.description: How the patient enrolled in assistance, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: CVR_PREG_INT_SCR_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the patient plans to have a pregnancy intention screening, for contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR).

columns.name: DME_LAST_CERT_DT
columns.description: Last certification date for the durable medical equipment (DME).

columns.name: HDH_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for Health and Developmental History.

columns.name: OVRIDE_OHIP_MASTER_NUM
columns.description: The override master number for Ontario Health Insurance Plan (OHIP).

columns.name: OVRIDE_DON_REC_OHIP_NUM
columns.description: The recipient's Ontario Health Insurance Plan (OHIP) number for donor claims.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_CITY
columns.description: Employer city for an accident claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Employer state for an accident claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_ZIP
columns.description: Employer zip for an accident claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Employer country for an accident claim.

columns.name: WK_COMP_EMPR_PHONE
columns.description: Employer phone number for an accident claim.

columns.name: PAT_ROLE_IN_ACCIDENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's role for an automobile accident claim.

columns.name: DRIVER_NAME
columns.description: Driver's name, for an auto accident.

columns.name: DRIVER_CITY
columns.description: Driver's city, for an auto accident.

columns.name: DRIVER_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Driver's state, for an auto accident.

columns.name: DRIVER_ZIP
columns.description: Driver's ZIP code, for an auto accident.

columns.name: DRIVER_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Driver's country, for an auto accident.

columns.name: DRIVER_PHONE
columns.description: Driver's phone number, for an auto accident.

columns.name: VEHICLE_REG_NUM
columns.description: The vehicle registration number of the car involved in an auto accident.

columns.name: PAY_TO_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Override for the Alberta Health Services (AHS) pay-to code.

columns.name: PAY_TO_PHN
columns.description: The Alberta Health Services (AHS) pay-to patient health number.

columns.name: OTHER_PAYEE_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the other payee guarantor account number for AHS.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PICK_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: Emergency Medical Services (EMS) code for the ambulance pick-up location, for Alberta Blue Cross.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: Emergency Medical Services (EMS) code for the ambulance drop-off location, for Alberta Blue Cross.

columns.name: PRIOR_INV_NUM
columns.description: The previous invoice number for Alberta Health Services (AHS) professional claims.

columns.name: INJURY_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The cause of the injury.

columns.name: INJURY_ACTIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The main activity of the injured person, or the type of situation the injured person was in, at the time of injury.

columns.name: INJURY_MECHANISM_C_NAME
columns.description: The activity, contact, or influence that caused the injury to occur.

columns.name: INJURY_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description: How seriously the patient appears to be injured.

columns.name: TXPORT_MEANS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of transportation being used by the injured person at the time of the traffic accident.

columns.name: INJURY_MUNICIP_C_NAME
columns.description: The municipality where the injury took place.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_LONGITUDE
columns.description: The longitude of where the auto accident took place.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_LATITUDE
columns.description: The latitude of where the auto accident took place.

columns.name: CNTRPARTY_VEHICLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of vehicle which caused the auto accident.

columns.name: TRAFFIC_SITUATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the accident-causing traffic situation.

columns.name: USED_PROTECTION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the injured person used protection, such as a helmet or seat belt, at the time of the injury.

columns.name: PRODUCT_USED_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the machinery or equipment being used at the time of the work-related injury.

columns.name: PLAYGROUND_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Type of playground the accident occurred on.

columns.name: INJURY_PRODUCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Type of product involved in the injury.

columns.name: PRODUCT_NAME
columns.description: Name of the product involved in the injury.

columns.name: PRODUCT_DEFECTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the product that led to injury was defective.

columns.name: PRODUCT_DESC
columns.description: A description of the product involved in the injury.

columns.name: EMPR_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the industry of the injured personï¿½s employer.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Country where the accident occurred.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: District where the accident occurred.

columns.name: ACDNT_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: House number where the accident occurred.

columns.name: FIRST_DEPT_REFERRED_TO
columns.description: Referral 1: referred-to department name

columns.name: SECOND_DEPT_REFERRED_TO
columns.description: Referral 2: referred-to department name
